title: Lemon Caper Asparagus

ingredients.content: 12 oz pencil-thin asparagus, woody ends trimmed
3 oz unsalted butter, cut into pieces
1 lemon, cut into wedges, to garnish

preparations.content: Line bottom and sides of Varoma dish with parchment. Place Varoma into position, weigh in asparagus and set aside.
Place shallots, capers, garlic and salt into mixing bowl and chop <b>3 sec/speed 5<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add butter and sauté <b>3 min/212°F/speed 1<b>. Add lemon juice and cook <b>2 min/212°F/speed 1<b>. Pour lemon caper mixture over reserved asparagus in Varoma.

Place water into mixing bowl. Set Varoma into position, secure Varoma lid and steam <b>10 min/Varoma/speed 1<b>. Transfer steamed asparagus to a serving platter and garnish with lemon wedges and zest. Transfer reserved lemon caper sauce to a small serving bowl and serve immediately.

hintsAndTricks: Double lemon juice from 1 oz to 2 oz for a sharper lemon flavor.
